think_procedure: First, I researched the function and possible values of the 'innodb_purge_rseg_truncate_frequency' knob. I found that it is used to specify how often InnoDB truncates the history list, with a range of 1 to 128. There was no mention of any special values that would change the function of this knob. Therefore, I concluded that it is not a 'special knob'.
